snippet: Two possible theories emerged for why a former police officer opened fire on the federal courthouse in Wheeling before he was killed by law officers on Wednesday.
abstract: Two possible theories emerge for why former police officer Thomas J Piccard opened fire on the federal courthouse in Wheeling, W Va, before he was killed by law officers.
lead_paragraph: Two possible theories emerged for why a former police officer opened fire on the federal courthouse in Wheeling before he was killed by law officers on Wednesday.

headline.main: West Virginia: Motive Sought in Courthouse Shooting
headline.print_headline: West Virginia: Motive Sought In Courthouse Shooting
